body_html:
@universewill @ulgus @shlens is there a current solution to this ? we need a nightly batch processing of 100 of K of images. I have been considering using this method combining it with spark - http://go.databricks.com/hubfs/notebooks/TensorFlow/Distributed_processing_of_images_using_TensorFlow.html

sc = pyspark Context
